person.persName: Margaret Frances Combs Bridgeford (Frankfort, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, resident. Clark County, Kentucky, native. Daughter of William R. Combs. Married to Albert Bridgeport in 1847. Mother of Mary A. Bridgeford, William Bridgeford, Ella Bridgeford, and Charles Bridgeford. Resident of Frankfort, Kentucky, in 1860. Shot by Albert Bridgeport in Franklin County.
